thread.title: Calls for the health service to consider offering medical cannabis to more people

author: ITVNews
title: Calls for the health service to consider offering medical cannabis to more people
text: Series 9 • The latest news from ITV News at Ten Calls for the health service to consider offering medical cannabis to more people • Sam Ashton from Barry has been using the drug for several years and says it's key to managing her pain, but the treatment on the NHS remains low.
